title: Parvati Valley Escape
excerpt: Drift into the emerald heart of Parvati — a valley of waterfalls, hot springs, and rare silence that rewires the restless mind.

title: Lahaul Getaway
excerpt: Cross the Rohtang into Lahaul — a high-altitude world of barley fields, gompas, and road-less horizons that few travellers dare to reach.

title: Spiti Escape
excerpt: Journey into the cold desert of Spiti — monasteries perched on cliffs, fossil riverbeds, and a sky so vast it makes you feel small and free.

title: Guided Hikes
excerpt: Let a local guide lead you through forest trails and mountain passes that no map has named — stories come free with every step.

title: Stargazing
excerpt: At 2,000 metres with zero light pollution, the Milky Way is not a photograph — it is the ceiling above you. Bring a blanket.

title: Village Walks
excerpt: Walk through Kasol and Rasol villages, meet farmers, share chai, and see the Himalayas the way people actually live in them.

title: River Rafting
excerpt: Ride the Beas through boulder-strewn rapids — an hour of pure adrenaline flanked by pine forests and canyon walls.

title: Yoga & Meditation
excerpt: Morning sessions on the deck with a valley view below — let a certified instructor guide you back to stillness at altitude.

title: Foraging Walks
excerpt: Walk into the forest with a local herbalist and learn which plants heal, which flavour a meal, and which have kept mountain communities alive for centuries.
